5. `org.mockito.internal.verification.MockAwareVerificationMode:getMock()Ljava/lang/Object;`

- `org.mockito.internal.progress.ThreadSafeMockingProgress:verificationStarted(Lorg/mockito/verification/VerificationMode;)V` (ID: 40)
- `org.mockito.internal.progress.MockingProgressImpl:verificationStarted(Lorg/mockito/verification/VerificationMode;)V` (ID: 41)

Given that the test is failing due to an assertion related to the verification of mock interactions, the methods related to the verification process are highly suspicious.

In this ranking:
